LanguageData.Eclipse.label: sun went out
LanguageData.Eclipse.description: The sun has been turned off... again
LanguageData.Eclipse.endMessage: At last, the sun's come back on! About bloody time.
LanguageData.Eclipse.letterText: Damn it, the sun's gone out again! Why can't the bloody thing just stay on.\n\nHow's anyone meant to get a decent crop like this.
